radiographic_examinations.findings: Twin pregnancy (monochorionic, diamniotic) with two male fetuses, both lacking tooth germs.
Confirmed the ultrasonographic findings and supported a diagnosis of XLHED in both twins.
Presence of 10 and 8 tooth germs in the twins, respectively.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Compared with 3 teeth and 1 additional tooth germ in their untreated brother.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Presence of 9 tooth germs in Patient 3.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Compared with only 2 tooth buds in his 2-year-old brother.
